issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: SLIDER-1052 has found a deadlock which can arise in it during AM restart. Looking at the thread trace, one of the blockages is actually {{AbstractService.getConfig()}} â€”this is synchronized and so blocked.

comments.body: I don't see why we need this to be synchronized (it's that way in branch-205); the actual type is {{volatile}} so access is thread safe anyway.
SLIDER-1052 shows this. I'm not going to blame this JIRA for that, but it's certainly where the problem arises
Patch 001, removes the -synchronized attributed. The field is still volatile (and only written in {{Service.init()}}
